data.introduce: 航班座位图查询服务提供查看航班座位示意图的功能，以方便代理人在线实现为旅客预定航班座位的要求。此接口只提供座位图查询，不提供选座功能。
data.business: 航班座位图查询接口提供简单有效的在线查询通道，可以实时查询某个航班的座位情况。
data.functions:
本服务支持的功能如下：
1、根据订座记录编号（即PNR号）和需要显示座位图的航段在订座记录中的序号来查询座位图
2、根据订座记录编号、航班号、航班的起飞时间和航班的起始到达城市来查询座位图
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirSeatMapRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空座位图显示请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？：？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"SeatMapRequests","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位图查询请求集合","children":[{"name":"SeatMapRequest","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"座位图查询请求","children":[{"name":"FlightSegmentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出发机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标识：可表示航段在PNR中的index：根据航段序号查询座位图时必输","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发时间：在没有航段序号时必输","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TravelerRefNumberRPHs","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客引用标识组","children":[]},{"name":"@MultiOptionInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"多属性座位标识：根据PNR查询时，MultiOptionInd为true时可查询多属性座位图。 注意：仅在C系统且为外航时才支持","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号上下文","children":[]}]},{"name":"@EchoToken","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@TimeStamp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Target","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@SysType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"C","description":"系统类型：系统类型:默认值C (CRS)，可选值B( ICS)","children":[]}]}]

uantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码上下文","children":[]},{"name":"@Terminal","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航站楼","children":[]},{"name":"@Gate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出站口","children":[]},{"name":"@BaggageClaim","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"取行李处","children":[]},{"name":"@Diversion","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"OperatingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"承运方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：MU）","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码上下文","children":[]},{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司名称","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号（例如：1831）","children":[]}]},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"机型信息","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"飞机型号","children":[]},{"name":"@ChangeofGauge","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否换过飞机","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码上下文","children":[]},{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司名称","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标识：可表示航段在PNR中的index：根据航段序号查询座位图时必输","children":[]},{"name":"@Depa                         ' ':No seat or

n":"航空公司代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号上下文","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@EchoToken","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@TimeStamp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Target","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@SequenceNmbr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_AirSeatMapRQ>
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191" />
	</POS>
	<SeatMapRequests>
		<SeatMapRequest>
			<FlightSegmentInfo FlightNumber="1589"
		DepartureDateTime="2012-11-12T20:30:00">
				<DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK" />
				<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA" />
				<MarketingAirline Code="CA" />
			</FlightSegmentInfo>
		</SeatMapRequest>
	</SeatMapRequests>
	<BookingReferenceID ID="HR7D08" />
</OTA_AirSeatMapRQ>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirSeatMapRQ SysType="B">
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="PEK112">
             <RequestorID><CompanyName Code="MU"/></RequestorID>
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <SeatMapRequests>
        <SeatMapRequest>
            <FlightSegmentInfo RPH="3" />
        </SeatMapRequest>
    </SeatMapRequests>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="MTFZNG" />
</OTA_AirSeatMapRQ>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirSeatMapRQ SysType="C">
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191">
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <SeatMapRequests>
        <SeatMapRequest MultiOptionInd="true">
            <FlightSegmentInfo RPH="2" />
        </SeatMapRequest>
    </SeatMapRequests>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="KQTHKJ" />
</OTA_AirSeatMapRQ>
